mapper.sql: order_id, order_type, check_stat, remit_amt, inaccount_amt, provider_id, company_id, remit_check, inaccount_check, platform_receiver_check, company_receiver_check, evidence_url, remarks, data_stat, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time, lock_version
mapper.select:
select
from
where data_stat = '0' and provider_id = #{providerId} order by create_time desc
